org.sakaiproject.news.api

Interface NewsService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityProducer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicNewsService

    public interface NewsService
extends EntityProducer

    NewsService is the interface for retrieving and caching news items from a rss news feed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String REFERENCE_ROOT
      This string starts the references to resources in this service.
      static String SERVICE_NAME
      This string can be used to find the service in the service manager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NewsChannel getChannel(String source)
      Retrieves a NewsChannel object indexed by a URL.
      List getChannels()
      Retrieves a list of rss feeds that are being used.
      List getNewsitems(String channel)
      Retrieves a list of items from an rss feed.
      List getNewsitems(String channel, Filter filter)
      Retrieves a list of items from an rss feed.
      boolean isUpdateAvailable(String channel)
      Checks whether an update is available for the rss news feed.
      void removeChannel(String channel)
      Retrieves a list of rss feeds that are being used.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.entity.api.EntityProducer

        archive, getEntity, getEntityAuthzGroups, getEntityDescription, getEntityResourceProperties, getEntityUrl, getHttpAccess, getLabel, merge, parseEntityReference, willArchiveMerge

    • Field Detail

      • SERVICE_NAME

        static final String SERVICE_NAME
        This string can be used to find the service in the service manager.

      • REFERENCE_ROOT

        static final String REFERENCE_ROOT
        This string starts the references to resources in this service.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getChannels

        List getChannels()
        Retrieves a list of rss feeds that are being used.
        Returns:
        A list of NewsChannel objects (possibly empty).

      • getChannel

        NewsChannel getChannel(String source)
                       throws NewsConnectionException,
                              NewsFormatException
        Retrieves a NewsChannel object indexed by a URL.
        Parameters:
        source - The url for the channel.
        Returns:
        A NewsChannel object (possibly null).
        Throws:
        NewsConnectionException
        NewsFormatException

      • removeChannel

        void removeChannel(String channel)
        Retrieves a list of rss feeds that are being used.
        Throws:
        ? - if param channel is not a valid url.

      • getNewsitems

        List getNewsitems(String channel)
                  throws NewsConnectionException,
                         NewsFormatException
        Retrieves a list of items from an rss feed.
        Parameters:
        channel - The url for the feed.
        Returns:
        A list of NewsItem objects retrieved from the feed.
        Throws:
        ? - if param feed is not a valid url.
        NewsConnectionException
        NewsFormatException

      • getNewsitems

        List getNewsitems(String channel,
                Filter filter)
                  throws NewsConnectionException,
                         NewsFormatException
        Retrieves a list of items from an rss feed.
        Parameters:
        channel - The url for the feed.
        filter - A filtering object to accept NewsItems, or null if no filtering is desired.
        Returns:
        A list of NewsItem objects retrieved from the feed.
        Throws:
        ? - if param feed is not a valid url.
        NewsConnectionException
        NewsFormatException

      • isUpdateAvailable

        boolean isUpdateAvailable(String channel)
        Checks whether an update is available for the rss news feed.
        Parameters:
        feed - The url for the feed.
        Returns:
        true if update is available, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ? - if param feed is not a valid url.
